thread.title: UPDATE: Missing elderly man located safe
thread.title_full: UPDATE: Missing elderly man located safe - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: UPDATE: Missing elderly man located safe
text:
NORTH CLARENDON, Vt. - UPDATE: Gordon Stacey has been located safe and reunited with family.
Vermont State Police started searching for the missing elderly man from North Clarendon Saturday.
88-year-old Gordon Stacey was last seen at his house on Route 7B in North Clarendon around 2:00pm. Police say Stacey suffers from Alzheimer's and did not return from a planned outing. He is believed to be driving a blue 2007 Chevy Cobalt. Stacey is 5'10", 200 pounds, was wearing navy blue pants, and a black checkered sweater. Anyone who may have seen him is asked to call police.
Saturday night, police say he was located is now with family.
